articles.description: Princess Cruise today announced the sale of Pacific Princess to an undisclosed buyer. The 670-guest ship was the smallest in the current Princess fleet. Th...
articles.content:
Princess Cruise today announced the sale of Pacific Princess to an undisclosed buyer. The 670-guest ship was the smallest in the current Princess fleet.

articles.author: Bill Barber
articles.title: Entain appoint Jette Nygaard-Andersen as new chief executive - Racing Post
articles.description: Jette Nygaard-Andersen is to take over as the new chief executive of Ladbrokes Coral's owner Entain with immediate effect
articles.content:
The owner of Ladbrokes and Coral has acted quickly to put a new chief executive in place following one of the most turbulent periods in the company's history.
